Job Description: What we are expecting      Proven software development experience ( 4yrs) with high PHP skills     Experience in Web services like secure APIs, SOAP, REST API, oAuth and websocket.     Good working knowledge of web technologies including HTML5, CSS, Javascript, AJAX, MYSQL, JQuery, Bootstrap etc     Good working knowledge of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services     Experience in Object oriented PHP programming and MVC frameworks preferably Laravel.     Knowledge in latest frontend technologies like ReactJS, NodeJS will be added advantage.     Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules and strong optimization and functional programming.     Strong communication skills.
